channel.title: Media Tools on The Hosted Shop
channel.description: Recent content in Media Tools on The Hosted Shop

item.title: Nvidia Driver Installation
item.description: Install Nvidia Driver By Repository Install Nvidia Driver By Run File Install Nvidia Driver By Repository Add non-free Debian repository # Debian Bookworm deb http://deb.debian.org/debian/ bookworm main contrib non-free Update all packages to latest version sudo apt-get update Install Nvidia Drivers # Install nvidia driver from main repository sudo apt-get install nvidia-driver nvidia-smi # Install nvidia driver from back-ports sudo apt-get install -t nvidia-driver nvidia-smi Install Nvidia Driver By Run File Download linux driver from Nvidia
